titleStmt.title: Elegies on I. Her Late Majesty of blessed memory, II. Late Arch-Bishop of Canterbury, III. Illustrious Duke of Ormond and Earl of Ossory, IV. Countess of Dorset, V. Consolatory poem, &c. together with A poem on the promotion of several eminent persons, &c. / by N. Tate ...
titleStmt.author: Tate, Nahum, 1652-1715.

notesStmt.note: Each poem, except the first, has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
